Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Detroit in 2011...
Traded from Detroit to Cleveland on 4/23/2014 (Going to CLE: SS R. Pierson, 1B T. Harrison. Going to DET: P S. Hernandez)...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 7/7/2016 (Going to STL: RF T. Harrison, SS H. Prioleau, P A. Leak, P B. Kim. Going to CLE: P J. Santana, 1B M. Napoli)...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2017, off Guy Swift (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/2017, off JR Graham (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/19/2019, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
